announcement.p: A critical bug with file uploads as well as the fastcgi sapi has been discovered in PHP 5.1.3 and a new PHP release 5.1.4 has been made available to address these two issues. All PHP users are encouraged to upgrade to this release as soon as possible.
This release provides fixes for the following bugs:

ul.li: Fixed problems with file uploads and the $_POST array handling.
Resolved multiple problems with the FastCGI sapi.
Fixed cloning of DOM Documents and Noded.
Several fixes to PDO ODBC driver.

announcement.p: For a full list of changes in PHP 5.1.4, see the ChangeLog.
